name: Callable - Slack Notification when Opportunity Approved
description:
**Trigger**: It's a callable recipe which is being trigger by the phase 2 APN recipe.

**Description**: Send a Slack message when an Opportunity that is shared with APN is approved by AWS.

**Actions**: It receive the apn id and opp status as an input from parent recipe and generate notifications  to send in aws-opps channel.

code.description: New call for Callable - Slack Notification when Opportunity approved

blocks.section_text: Hi #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.slack_user_name')}, your opp <#{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.apn_link')}|#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.get_custom_object(Opportunity__c>id, sobject_name: Opportunity).Name')}> with *#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.AccountName__c')}* has been approved by AWS :tada: so you can now reach out to the rep and the ISM (ISMs act as liaisons between AWS reps and partners like Rapid7).

Please send an email to both of them *immediately* introducing yourself and provide a few time slots that you’re available for an introductory call (make sure #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.r_7_ace_opp_owner')} is available at those times and included on the invite). Clicking the button below makes this super easy.

elements.text: If a random email app opens, <https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/set-gmail-as-browser-default-email-client-ht|click here> for instructions on making Gmail your default email client.

blocks.section_text: Hi @#{_('data.workato_service.315049d6.reply.user.name')}, your opp <#{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.apn_link')}|#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.get_custom_object(Opportunity__c>id, sobject_name: Opportunity).Name')}> with *#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.AccountName__c')}* has been approved by AWS :tada: so you can now reach out to the rep and the ISM (ISMs act as liaisons between AWS reps and partners like Rapid7).

Please send an email to both of them *immediately* introducing yourself and provide a few time slots that you’re available for an introductory call (make sure #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.r_7_ace_opp_owner')} is available at those times and included on the invite). Clicking the button below makes this super easy.

blocks.section_text: Hi #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.slack_user_name')}, your opp <#{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.apn_link')}|#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.get_custom_object(Opportunity__c>id, sobject_name: Opportunity).Name')}> with *#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.AccountName__c')}* has been approved by AWS :tada:. Here is the contact information for the account (as a reminder, ISMs act as liaisons between AWS reps and partners like Rapid7)

Although you marked this opportunity as being shared for visibility only, feel free to reach out to the AWS rep and the ISM if you decide that would be valuable. Thanks and let #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.r_7_ace_opp_owner')} know if you have any questions.

Hi @#{_('data.workato_service.315049d6.reply.user.name')}, your opp <#{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.apn_link')}|#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.get_custom_object(Opportunity__c>id, sobject_name: Opportunity).Name')}> with *#{_('data.salesforce.f4b5647e.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.AccountName__c')}* has been approved by AWS :tada:. Here is the contact information for the account (as a reminder, ISMs act as liaisons between AWS reps and partners like Rapid7)

Although you marked this opportunity as being shared for visibility only, feel free to reach out to the AWS rep and the ISM if you decide that would be valuable. Thanks and let #{_('data.workato_variable.f50188c6.r_7_ace_opp_owner')} know if you have any questions.
